title.rendered: Why Ziplining is the Perfect Gift for Father’s Day

content.rendered:
We know what it’s like to wait until last minute to buy presents, especially when time is flying by.  It’s just over a week away from Father’s Day and if you’re still searching for a great present, we’ve got you covered with our multiple aerial adventures in Colorado.

Head to Buena Vista

Spend your weekend in the Arkansas River Valley!  The Mountaintop Zipline, Granite Via Ferrata, and rock climbing excursions in Buena Vista will have you catching incredible views of the surrounding mountain vistas, and they’re all situated at the base of the breathtaking Collegiate Peaks.

Mountaintop Zipline

This course incorporates multiple suspended bridges throughout its 7 lines and flies high above the valley with incredible views of the Arkansas River and surrounding peaks.

VIEW TRIP

Granite Via Ferrata

We’re still buttoning up the last portions of this new adventure with AVA, but we’re nearly ready to go to take guests on this thrilling excursion.  As we test out the heart pounding new free fall, traverse along the iron rungs, and make sure it’ll be the best 3-hour tour of your life, call our adventure specialists today to see if you and your dad can venture out on this exhilarating trip!

VIEW TRIP

Rock Climbing

Try out this popular past time in Colorado and push your limits on our rock climbing trip.  This 1/2 Day excursion will have you navigating the Granite rock face and your experienced guide will help you along the way.  If you’ve already done your fair share of rock climbing, your guide can point out some of the harder paths for you to take on.

VIEW TRIP

Don’t Stray Far from the Denver Area

If you only have a few hours over the afternoon for an adventure, AVA’s Idaho Springs outpost should be on your to-do list.  This historic mountain town is only 30 minutes west of the Denver area and has plenty of high-flying excursions that will keep your dad smiling.

Cliffside Zipline

Take in views of the Continental Divide as you soar along the 6-line course.  You’ll get to cross a plethora of suspended bridges along the way, as well as take on a free fall off the end of a wooden bridge.  This venture will only take you a few hours, then you can make your way over to the downtown stretch of Idaho Springs for some great food and fun shops after.

VIEW TRIP

Mount Evans Via Ferrata

As AVA’s original mountaineering excursion, this Via Ferrata has gotten a lot of love over the past year and makes the great adventure if you want a step up from ziplining.  Traverse the cliffside, rappel down a 70-foot rock face, try some assisted rock climbing, and zipline all in one excursion.

VIEW TRIP

The best part of booking a trip for you and your dad with AVA Rafting & Zipline is that we can customize a gift certificate for the occasion.  Call our adventure specialists today to set this Father’s Day up for success!
